item.title: Major Lukoil Refinery Halts Oil Intake After Ukraine Strike
item.description: Lukoil PJSC’s major Volgograd refinery has halted oil intake following one of the latest in a series of Ukrainian drone strikes on Russian energy assets, said a person familiar with the matter, who as
